name: Snowball (itch) (Mon amiral)
description:
Sound warning!

Whoa, you don't even need to go outside and buy carrots to make your own snowperson!
Also, the laws of physics don't apply so you can make something extra.

Controls:
- With the glove, left click anywhere to create a new snowball. Then, click & drag on the snowball to roll it. Hold until it is big enough, and close to another snowball. Then, release to attach the snowballs together!
- Use the mouse scrollwheel or Tab to switch between the glove and a variety of items to attach to snowballs.
- With an item in hand, left click on a snowball to attach it.
- Middle-click to rotate the camera.

Credits:
- Rolling sound: Footsteps in fresh snow by Florian Reichelt
- Hit sound: SFX_Snowball_Hit01 by bajko
- Music: Winter Village by Visager
